Settings.QueryText:
SELECT CatalogProducts.Ref, CatalogProducts.DeletionMark, CatalogProducts.Code, CatalogProducts.Description, CatalogProducts.Type, CatalogProducts.CostingMethod, CatalogProducts.InventoryOrExpenseAccount, CatalogProducts.IncomeAccount, CatalogProducts.COGSAccount, CatalogProducts.UnitSet, Units.Code AS UM, CatalogProducts.DefaultLocation, CatalogProducts.PreferredVendor, CatalogProducts.Price, CatalogProducts.CF1String, CatalogProducts.CF2String, CatalogProducts.CF3String, CatalogProducts.CF4String, CatalogProducts.CF5String, CatalogProducts.CF1Num, CatalogProducts.CF2Num, CatalogProducts.CF3Num, CatalogProducts.CF4Num, CatalogProducts.CF5Num, CatalogProducts.Category, CatalogProducts.NewObject, CatalogProducts.Predefined, CatalogProducts.PredefinedDataName, CatalogProducts.Assembly, CatalogProducts.HasResiduals, CatalogProducts.HasLotsSerialNumbers, CatalogProducts.UseLots, CatalogProducts.UseLotsType, CatalogProducts.Characteristic, CatalogProducts.UseLotsByExpiration, CatalogProducts.ShelfLife, CatalogProducts.ShelfLifeUnit, CatalogProducts.UseSerialNumbersOnShipment, CatalogProducts.UseSerialNumbersOnGoodsReception, CatalogProducts.UseSerialNumbersCheckReception, CatalogProducts.UseSerialNumbersCheckUniqueness, CatalogProducts.CostingMethod AS CostingMethod1, CatalogProducts.InventoryOrExpenseAccount AS InventoryOrExpenseAccount1, CatalogProducts.IncomeAccount AS IncomeAccount1, CatalogProducts.COGSAccount AS COGSAccount1, CatalogProducts.UnitSet AS UnitSet1, CatalogProducts.DefaultLocation AS DefaultLocation1, CatalogProducts.PreferredVendor AS PreferredVendor1, CatalogProducts.Category AS Category1, CatalogProducts.UPC, CatalogProducts.vendor_code, CatalogProducts.vendor_description, CatalogProducts.Taxable, CatalogProducts.Price AS Price1, CatalogProducts.WasteAccount, CatalogProducts.PricePrecision, CatalogProducts.TaxCode, CatalogProducts.DiscountIsTaxable, ISNULL(TT.QtyOnSO, 0) AS QtyOnSO, ISNULL(TT.QtyOnPO, 0) AS QtyOnPO, ISNULL(TT.QtyOnHand, 0) AS QtyOnHand, CASE WHEN CatalogProducts.Type = VALUE(Enum.InventoryTypes.Inventory) THEN ISNULL(TT.QtyOnHand, 0) + ISNULL(TT.QtyOnPO, 0) - ISNULL(TT.QtyOnSO, 0) WHEN CatalogProducts.Type = VALUE(Enum.InventoryTypes.NonInventory) THEN 0 ELSE 0 END AS QtyAvailableToPromise, CASE WHEN zoho_productCodeMap.zoho_id <> "" THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS Zoho FROM Catalog.zoho_productCodeMap AS zoho_productCodeMap RIGHT JOIN Catalog.Products AS CatalogProducts LEFT JOIN (SELECT ISNULL(OrdersRegisteredBalance.Product, TT_QtyOnHandAndQtyOnPO.Product) AS Product, SUM(CASE WHEN OrdersRegisteredBalance.Product.Type = VALUE(Enum.InventoryTypes.Inventory) THEN CASE WHEN OrdersRegisteredBalance.QuantityBalance - OrdersRegisteredBalance.ShippedBalance > 0 THEN (OrdersRegisteredBalance.QuantityBalance - OrdersRegisteredBalance.ShippedBalance) * OrdersRegisteredBalance.Unit.Factor ELSE 0 END WHEN OrdersRegisteredBalance.Product.Type = VALUE(Enum.InventoryTypes.NonInventory) THEN CASE WHEN OrdersRegisteredBalance.QuantityBalance - OrdersRegisteredBalance.InvoicedBalance > 0 THEN (OrdersRegisteredBalance.QuantityBalance - OrdersRegisteredBalance.InvoicedBalance) * OrdersRegisteredBalance.Unit.Factor ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END) AS QtyOnSO, ISNULL(TT_QtyOnHandAndQtyOnPO.QtyOnPO, 0) AS QtyOnPO, ISNULL(TT_QtyOnHandAndQtyOnPO.QtyOnHand, 0) AS QtyOnHand FROM AccumulationRegister.OrdersRegistered.Balance AS OrdersRegisteredBalance LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersStatuses.SliceLast AS OrdersStatusesSliceLast ON OrdersRegisteredBalance.Order = OrdersStatusesSliceLast.Order AND (OrdersStatusesSliceLast.Status = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR OrdersStatusesSliceLast.Status = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Backordered)) FULL JOIN (SELECT ISNULL(OrdersDispatchedBalance.Product, TT_QtyOnHand.Product) AS Product, SUM(CASE WHEN OrdersDispatchedBalance.Product.Type = VALUE(Enum.InventoryTypes.Inventory) THEN CASE WHEN OrdersDispatchedBalance.QuantityBalance - OrdersDispatchedBalance.ReceivedBalance > 0 THEN (OrdersDispatchedBalance.QuantityBalance - OrdersDispatchedBalance.ReceivedBalance) * OrdersDispatchedBalance.Unit.Factor ELSE 0 END WHEN OrdersDispatchedBalance.Product.Type = VALUE(Enum.InventoryTypes.NonInventory) THEN CASE WHEN OrdersDispatchedBalance.QuantityBalance - OrdersDispatchedBalance.InvoicedBalance > 0 THEN (OrdersDispatchedBalance.QuantityBalance - OrdersDispatchedBalance.InvoicedBalance) * OrdersDispatchedBalance.Unit.Factor ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END) AS QtyOnPO, ISNULL(TT_QtyOnHand.QtyOnHand, 0) AS QtyOnHand FROM AccumulationRegister.OrdersDispatched.Balance AS OrdersDispatchedBalance LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersStatuses.SliceLast AS OrdersStatusesSliceLast ON OrdersDispatchedBalance.Order = OrdersStatusesSliceLast.Order AND (OrdersStatusesSliceLast.Status = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR OrdersStatusesSliceLast.Status = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Backordered)) FULL JOIN (SELECT InventoryJournalBalance.Product AS Product, CASE WHEN InventoryJournalBalance.Product.Type = VALUE(Enum.InventoryTypes.Inventory) THEN InventoryJournalBalance.QuantityBalance WHEN InventoryJournalBalance.Product.Type = VALUE(Enum.InventoryTypes.NonInventory) THEN 0 ELSE 0 END AS QtyOnHand FROM AccumulationRegister.InventoryJournal.Balance(, ) AS InventoryJournalBalance) AS TT_QtyOnHand ON OrdersDispatchedBalance.Product = TT_QtyOnHand.Product
GROUP BY ISNULL(OrdersDispatchedBalance.Product, TT_QtyOnHand.Product), ISNULL(TT_QtyOnHand.QtyOnHand, 0)) AS TT_QtyOnHandAndQtyOnPO ON OrdersRegisteredBalance.Product = TT_QtyOnHandAndQtyOnPO.Product
GROUP BY ISNULL(OrdersRegisteredBalance.Product, TT_QtyOnHandAndQtyOnPO.Product), ISNULL(TT_QtyOnHandAndQtyOnPO.QtyOnPO, 0), ISNULL(TT_QtyOnHandAndQtyOnPO.QtyOnHand, 0)) AS TT ON CatalogProducts.Ref = TT.Product LEFT JOIN Catalog.Units AS Units ON CatalogProducts.UnitSet = Units.Owner AND (Units.BaseUnit = TRUE) ON zoho_productCodeMap.product_ref = CatalogProducts.Ref
